rows.label: qst000508_msg0001
rows.name:
You heard him, didn't you? My
husband is a stubborn man.

rows.label: qst000508_msg0002
rows.name:
I might be able to persuade
him if I helped...but without
them here, it's impossible.

rows.label: qst000508_msg0003
rows.name:
Still, if Riana is happy now,
maybe that's for the best...
